ygData.subject: Bugs to work out.
ygData.msgSnippet: Phobias babies scattered around the base doing what any bug would do. Pests of any type could find a way to be a nuisance but these bugs knew how to do it with

Phobias babies scattered around the base doing what any bug would do. 
Pests of any type could find a way to be a nuisance but these bugs 
knew how to do it with finesse. they got into the ships replicators 
and tried to interface.

They got into the ships comm system and created a feedback loop which 
caused a loud squeal of sound to echo through the ship. Jamming the 
ships main comm was just the first step though.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, kinger01030@c... wrote:
>  eath got a light bulb in his head. He knew how he could help 
destructor and 
> his quest to take the alliance.....he headed out the door of the 
ship and 
> flew off to a far place.
